code: import{SET_PAGE_CONTENT,SET_NAVBAR_ACTIVEITEM,ADD_CART_ITEM,REMOVE_CART_ITEM,SET_PRODUCT_DETAIL}from"../utils/constants";import products from"../json/products.json";export var addCartItem=function addCartItem(dispatch,product,qty){var item={id:product.id,name:product.name,image:product.image,price:product.price,author:product.author,color:product.color,countInStock:product.countInStock,qty:qty};dispatch({type:ADD_CART_ITEM,payload:item});};export var removeCartItem=function removeCartItem(dispatch,productId){dispatch({type:REMOVE_CART_ITEM,payload:productId});};export var setProductDetail=function setProductDetail(dispatch,productId,qty){var product=products.find(function(x){return x.id===productId;});if(qty===0&&product.countInStock>0)qty=1;dispatch({type:SET_PRODUCT_DETAIL,payload:{product:product,qty:qty}});};export var pageContentsSet=function pageContentsSet(dispatch,title,products){dispatch({type:SET_PAGE_CONTENT,payload:{title:title,products:products}});};export var activeNavItemSet=function activeNavItemSet(dispatch,activeNavItem){dispatch({type:SET_NAVBAR_ACTIVEITEM,payload:activeNavItem});};
